channel.title: My whip is screwed up badly
channel.description:
umm ive redone everything in dat maker and ive checked the custom animation and everythign for my client and removed it and tried pretty much everything i could think of but why is my whip doing this?
[img]http://img140.imageshack.us/img140/4214/87414363.jpg[/img]

item.title: My whip is screwed up badly
item.dc:creator: @deershoot3r deershoot3r
item.description:
@deershoot3r wrote:

thanks cj i figired it out, i moved the whip and found out my cusotm 508 to 317 whip animation was messing with it

Read full topic
item.source: My whip is screwed up badly

item.title: My whip is screwed up badly
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

Needs to be manually animated, there are corrupt vskin values near the lower end of the whip, and also, it needs to be moved up into your hand.

Read full topic
item.source: My whip is screwed up badly

item.title: My whip is screwed up badly
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

It might be the whip was made with special animations to give it the correct walkin animation and stuff, and without those it looks a little different.

Read full topic
